Package control

Provides the controlling body of the software: The whole program logic is contained in this package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileListHandler
    The Class FileListHandler is a singleton class, which handles system wide a Vector of InformationContainers to represent a list of the files saved in the cloud with their additional information.
    Main
    The Class Main.
    SettingsFileHandler
    The Class SettingsFileHandler handles the applications settings.cfg with the saved users and performs all actions onit.
    SystemInformationCollector
    The Class SystemInformationCollector collects information about the system the application is running on.
    SystemPathCollector
    The Class SystemPathCollector collects the paths of additional software used by the application.
    ThreadInstanceCreator
    The Class ThreaderInstanceCreator separates costly functions to different threads to avoid waiting times for the user.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SystemInformationCollector.OsID
    The Enum OsID. represents the different operating systems.
    ThreadInstanceCreator.command
    The Enum command contains the different commands with which a thread can be started.

Package control Description

Provides the controlling body of the software: The whole program logic is contained in this package.
